cover: ./books/The Life and Adventures of Robinson Crusoe/cover.jpg
description: The Life and Adventures of Robinson Crusoe is the story of the title character, Robinson Crusoe, an Englishman who goes on a long sea voyage to the Caribbean and then to the South Pacific. He is shipwrecked on a deserted island and survives there for many years, until he is rescued by a passing ship.
